blogPost.excerpt: Friday is an asynchronous platform that helps accelerate the transition to working from anywhere. Roadmap your day, stay in sync with your team, and stay connected without another meeting.
blogPost.body: Friday is an asynchronous platform that helps accelerate the transition to working from anywhere. Roadmap your day, stay in sync with your team, and stay connected without another meeting.
blogPost.title: Friday 2.0 - Async operating system for remote work
blogPost.author: Ryan Gum

localize.description: Friday是一个异步平台，可以帮助你加速过渡到在任何地方工作。为您的一天制定路线图，与您的团队保持同步，并在没有其他会议的情况下保持联系。
localize.tagline: 远程工作的异步操作系统

localize.description: Friday是一個異步平臺，可以幫助你加速過渡到在任何地方工作。爲您的一天制定路線圖，與您的團隊保持同步，並在沒有其他會議的情況下保持聯繫。
localize.tagline: 遠程工作的異步操作系統

previous.excerpt: DocAcquire eliminates MANUAL DATA ENTRY by extracting data from ANY Document and make it available FASTER.
previous.title: DocAcquire - Extract data from ANY document faster

localize.description: DocAcquire通过从任何文档中提取数据，消除了手动数据输入，并使其更快可用。
localize.tagline: 更快地从任何文档中提取数据

localize.description: DocAcquire通過從任何文檔中提取數據，消除了手動數據輸入，並使其更快可用。
localize.tagline: 更快地從任何文檔中提取數據

next.excerpt: Lastbit Cards is a payment app for Europeans, featuring a MasterCard debit card that can be funded through instant Bitcoin transactions. Spend globally at online or physical stores and earn Bitcoin. Create burner cards for privacy and security.
next.title: Lastbit Cards - A card to spend and earn Bitcoin for Europeans

localize.description: Lastbit Cards是一款专为欧洲人设计的支付应用，特色是万事达借记卡，可以通过比特币交易即时充值。在全球范围内的在线或实体店消费，赚取比特币。创建烧钱卡，保证隐私和安全。
localize.tagline: 欧洲人消费赚取比特币的卡。

localize.description: Lastbit Cards是一款專爲歐洲人設計的支付應用，特色是萬事達借記卡，可以通過比特幣交易即時充值。在全球範圍內的在線或實體店消費，賺取比特幣。創建燒錢卡，保證隱私和安全。
localize.tagline: 歐洲人消費賺取比特幣的卡。
